description: This file defines a React Native login screen component that allows users to authenticate via email OTP using Supabase. It manages email input, OTP verification, and UI states for requesting and verifying OTPs.

methods.name: requestOtp
methods.description: Sends an OTP to the user's email via Supabase authentication.

methods.name: verifyOtp
methods.description: Verifies the OTP entered by the user with Supabase to authenticate.
